alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal Waldo; Coastal York; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 24 at 7:45AM EST until December 24 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor splash-over, beach erosion, and low lying flooding during this morning`s high tide cycle. * WHERE...Coastal York, Coastal Cumberland, Sagadahoc, Lincoln, Knox and Coastal Waldo Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 24/11 AM 12.0 2.3 0.5 1 Minor 25/12 AM 10.1 0.4 0.4 1 None 25/12 PM 11.9 2.2 0.4 1 None 26/01 AM 10.0 0.3 0.3 1 None 26/01 PM 11.7 2.0 0.4 1 None 27/02 AM 10.3 0.6 0.6 1 None Boothbay Harbor ME MLLW Categories - Minor 13.0 ft, Moderate 14.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.3 ft, Moderate 4.3 ft, Major 5.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 24/11 AM 11.6 1.9 0.4 6 None 25/12 AM 9.7 -0.0 0.3 5 None 25/12 PM 11.6 1.9 0.4 5 None 26/01 AM 9.6 -0.1 0.1 4-5 None 26/01 PM 11.2 1.5 0.3 2-3 None 27/02 AM 9.8 0.1 0.4 2 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
